overview: You’ve watched them on the beach, brushed against them in the elevator and passed them on the street. Now Edwin Durell- the master of modern erotica- brings your Dreamgirls to life in five brand new, incredibly erotic vignettes.  With Hitchcock-esque narration and some great acting, you’ll think you’re watching a Hollywood film. Impeccably-shot, the cinematography in the first scene alone will blow you away. This is gorgeous porn to pleasure yourself to, sex fiends!! Enjoy!!
title: DreamGirls
